mapper.select: SELECT B.FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME , B.FUNDING_CODE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM , A.FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME , A.FUNDING_CODE FROM (SELECT FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME , FF.FUNDING_CODE FROM TBL_FUNDING_FILE FF JOIN TBL_FUNDING F ON(FF.FUNDING_CODE = F.FUNDING_CODE) WHERE FF.FILE_TYPE = '메인' ORDER BY F.LIKES DESC) A) B WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
